thread.title: Holly Willoughby tipped for saucy teacher role in Hollyoaks
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby tipped for saucy teacher role in Hollyoaks

title: Holly Willoughby tipped for saucy teacher role in Hollyoaks
text:
“That would be a dramatic role – it would be great, I should do it” Holly Willoughby 
This wouldn't be a new storyline for Hollyoaks after characters Becca and Justin got close. 
How scandalous – and it seems the 36-year-old is well up for it, adding to the Sun: "That would be a dramatic role – it would be great, I should do it." 
Holly is already very busy with her television career, hosting a number of shows including This Morning, Play to the Whistle, Surprise Surprise, Meet the Parents. 
She also acts as a team captain on Celebrity Juice alongside Fearne Cotton and Keith Lemon. 
But the mum-of-three has another career path planned for her future as she revealed she'd like to move into documentaries. 
LIME PICTURES FAMILIAR FACE: Hollyoaks is no stranger to using celebrities in its cast 'This Morning' blunders Tuesday, 7th February 2017 When live TV goes horribly wrong: Take a look at Holly and Phil's best This Morning blunders. 1 / 23 
She admitted: "Hopefully This Morning doesn't end any time soon but eventually once all that time is finished I can focus on things like that and do passion projects and focus on things you really like and travel a bit when the kids are older." 
Ahead of Play to the Whistle's return tonight, Holly has been busy on the promotional circuit. 
She appeared on The One Show last night on which she was accosted by one of the other guests. 
ITV HOST WITH THE MOST: Holly fronts Play to the Whistle Hollyoaks' Hottest Babes These Hollyoaks babes prove why they're the queens of soap. 1 / 29 
It seemed This Morning's fashion host Trinny Woodall confirmed that Holly was pregnant last week after referring to her "bump". 
A representative for Holly later spoke out and confirmed there was no bump and that she is not pregnant. Related articles
